医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
ERS Genomics 与 IRBM 签署 CRISPR/Cas9 许可协议CRISPR 许可公司 ERS ​​Genomics Limited (“ERS”) 和药物发现领域的领导者 IRBM 今天宣布签署非独家 CRISPR/Cas9 许可协议。该协议授予 IRBM 访问 ERS ​​的 CRISPR/Cas9 专利组合的权限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/ERS-Genomics-and-IRBM-sign-CRISPRCas9-license-agreement.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/ERS-Genomics-and-IRBM-sign-CRISPRCas9-license-agreement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=839d58f0-af3e-4a2a-80b4-d42db55000be Tue, 21 May 2024 01:03:00 -0400 ERS Genomics and IRBM sign CRISPR/Cas9 license agreement
Hamilton 推出下一代排气移液技术：ZEUS X1 Hamilton 是全球领先的精密测量设备、自动化液体处理工作站和样品管理系统制造商，很高兴地宣布发布其最新创新产品 ZEUS X1。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Hamilton-unveils-next- Generation-of-air-displacement-pipetting-technology-ZEUS-X1.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240521/Hamilton-unveils-next- Generation-of-air-displacement-pipetting-technology-ZEUS-X1.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8bd26bf-9c6d-4676-8d57-bde024bcc787 Tue, 21 May 2024 01:01:00 -0400 Hamilton unveils next generation of air displacement pipetting technology: ZEUS X1
CLK激酶抑制剂1C8和GPS167对癌细胞增殖和转移的影响2024 年 5 月 16 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一篇新的研究论文，题为“通过对上皮-间质转化和抗病毒免疫反应的影响揭示了 CLK 激酶抑制剂 1C8 和 GPS167 的抗癌潜力”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Impact-of-CLK-kinase-inhibitors-1C8-and-GPS167-on-cancer-cell-proliferation-and-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Impact-of-CLK-kinase-inhibitors-1C8-and-GPS167-on-cancer-cell-proliferation-and-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=621eb8b5-7d90-48af-aee9-dd58098f52ac Mon, 20 May 2024 23:52:57 -0400 Impact of CLK kinase inhibitors 1C8 and GPS167 on cancer cell proliferation and metastasis
多奈哌齐未能增强乳腺癌幸存者的认知能力：III 期试验结果许多乳腺癌幸存者报告化疗后出现与癌症相关的认知障碍，尽管患病率和严重程度各不相同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Donepezil-fails-to-enhance-cognitive-powereds-in-breast-cancer-survivors-Phase-III-Trial-results-To-Test-Wether- A-痴呆-D.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Donepezil-fails-to-enhance-cognitive-powereds-in-breast-cancer-survivors-Phase-III-Trial-results-To-Test-Wether- A-痴呆-D.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a262898-287a-44a0-9596-11a9b73704d1 Mon, 20 May 2024 23:49:00 -0400 Donepezil fails to enhance cognitive abilities in breast cancer survivors: Phase III trial results
新的 CRISPR 筛选方法揭示了神经系统疾病的细胞驱动因素大脑通常被称为“黑匣子”——很难窥视内部并确定在任何特定时刻发生的事情。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/New-CRISPR-screen-method-reveals-cellular-drivers-of-neurological-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/New-CRISPR-screen-method-reveals-cellular-drivers-of-neurological-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7a6ad4d0-d912-4511-b45f-96fb21dfef44 Mon, 20 May 2024 23:42:49 -0400 New CRISPR screen method reveals cellular drivers of neurological disorders
更新的医疗指南拒绝“兴奋性谵妄”，以防止在警察拘留案件中滥用据《英国医学杂志》今天报道，有关兴奋性谵妄的最新医疗指南正在提前于预定日期 2025 年 10 月之前提出，兴奋性谵妄是一个有争议的术语，被指控掩盖警察拘留期间的死亡事件，包括乔治·弗洛伊德的死亡事件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Updated-medical-guidance-reject-excited-delirium-to-prevent-misuse-in-police-custody-cases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Updated-medical-guidance-reject-excited-delirium-to-prevent-misuse-in-police-custody-cases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3367dda3-8faa-4fb9-9238-391ee473effb Mon, 20 May 2024 23:34:54 -0400 Updated medical guidance reject 'excited delirium' to prevent misuse in police custody cases
研究发现，补充牛磺酸有望减少代谢综合征的危险因素《营养与糖尿病》中的一项研究对随机临床试验进行荟萃分析，发现补充牛磺酸可显着降低代谢综合征的关键危险因素，如高血压、空腹血糖和甘油三酯，且没有明显的副作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Taurine-supplementation-shows-promise-in-reducing-metabolic-syndrome-risk-factors-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Taurine-supplementation-shows-promise-in-reducing-metabolic-syndrome-risk-factors-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=655b7056-6cf1-4f80-be41-1885b86e50ad Mon, 20 May 2024 23:34:00 -0400 Taurine supplementation shows promise in reducing metabolic syndrome risk factors, study finds
过度使用社交媒体与青少年吸烟和电子烟增加有关呼吸系统杂志《Thorax》在线发表的一项研究表明，在社交媒体上花费的时间越多，儿童和年轻人吸烟和/或吸电子烟的可能性就越大。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Excessive-social-media-use-linked-to-increased-smoking-and-vaping-among-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Excessive-social-media-use-linked-to-increased-smoking-and-vaping-among-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b4be1e4-d6a0-4ac7-bc9b-bd1185e1a410 Mon, 20 May 2024 23:26:32 -0400 Excessive social media use linked to increased smoking and vaping among youth
研究发现，人工智能聊天机器人在癌症相关问题的同理心和可读性方面优于医生研究发现，与执业医生相比，人工智能聊天机器人在回答癌症相关询问时提供了更高的同理心、响应质量和可读性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/AI-chatbots-outperform-doctors-in-empathy-and-readability-for-cancer-lated-questions-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/AI-chatbots-outperform-doctors-in-empathy-and-readability-for-cancer-lated-questions-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=856c638a-7318-428b-ad4f-69efd5e0209a Mon, 20 May 2024 23:22:00 -0400 AI chatbots outperform doctors in empathy and readability for cancer-related questions, study finds
研究揭示了银屑病炎症的关键生物学途径一项新的研究发现，某种生物途径，即体内一系列相互关联的反应，会导致皮肤病牛皮癣中出现的炎症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Study-uncovers-key-biological-pathways-driven-psoriasis-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240520/Study-uncovers-key-biological-pathways-driven-psoriasis-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c1cb4de-98ce-4c6b-91b8-143721916fc9 Mon, 20 May 2024 23:21:48 -0400 Study uncovers key biological pathways driving psoriasis inflammation
